text: 13.10: Ais 33.1; Jer 15.2; 43.11; Mt 26.52; VB 14.12Fhe Bakɨme bɨnan kɨr saŋv guma the farasararga mba guma bɨnan kɨrga. Ana maaŋ muuŋgip ntari ga mbui kozan shogirim, rɨmɨn zav farasarigi guma, mbe ntari ga mbui kozan ana shogirim, ana rimgirga. Mba khesharigi tɨvi nden hɨrim, nde guigira Zisas khothɨgi gumgi gu mbigi, nde khaŋ thɨgɨp havhargip, ana khothɨgi ndɨkndɨga suirav havhargiri.
